actions.expectedResult: The Catalog submenu expands.
The product list page is displayed correctly.
A modal for selecting the product type appears.
The 'Standard product' type is selected.

actions.action: Click the 'Add new product' button to confirm
actions.expectedResult: The product creation page is loaded.
The product name is successfully entered.

actions.action: Upload 'cat notebook.jpg' as the product image
actions.expectedResult: The image is uploaded and a thumbnail is displayed.

actions.action: Enter the summary and description information for the product
actions.expectedResult: The product's summary and full description are filled in.
The category selection modal appears.

actions.action: Check one or more category checkboxes, e.g., 'Stationery'
actions.expectedResult: The checkboxes are successfully checked.
The category modal closes and the selected categories are displayed on the product page.
The brand list expands.
'Graphic Corner' is successfully selected.
The view switches to the 'Details' tab.
A new row for adding a feature appears.

actions.action: Select the feature 'Composition' from the 'Choose a feature' dropdown
actions.expectedResult: The feature 'Composition' is selected.

actions.action: Select the value 'Recycled cardboard' from the 'Choose a value' dropdown
actions.expectedResult: The feature value 'Recycled cardboard' is selected.
The view switches to the 'Stocks' tab.
The stock quantity is set successfully.
The view switches to the 'Pricing' tab.

actions.action: Enter the retail price '12.90' and wholesale price '5.49'
actions.expectedResult: The price information is filled in successfully.
The view switches to the 'Shipping' tab.

actions.action: Enter '0.3' into the shipping weight field
actions.expectedResult: The shipping weight is set successfully.
A 'Successful update' message is displayed at the top of the page.
